description: Yelan è un personaggio Hydro di Liyue che eccelle nel danno off-field e nell'applicazione Hydro. Il suo Elemental Burst fornisce danno consistente e applicazione Hydro.

artifacts.name: Emblem of Severed Fate (2) + Heart of Depth (2)

info: Yelan si concentra su HP% e CRIT per massimizzare il danno. Energy Recharge è importante per uptime costante del Burst.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Stealthy Bowshot
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Hydro DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Lingering Lifeline
skills.desc: Yelan creates a lifeline that allows her to move rapidly, dealing Hydro DMG to enemies along the path.
skills.details_html:
Lingering Lifeline
Yelan creates a lifeline that allows her to move rapidly, dealing Hydro DMG to enemies along the path.

skills.name: Depth-Clarion Dice
skills.desc: Yelan creates a field that deals Hydro DMG to nearby enemies and provides Hydro application.
skills.details_html:
Depth-Clarion Dice
Yelan creates a field that deals Hydro DMG to nearby enemies and provides Hydro application.

passive_talents.name: Turn Control
passive_talents.desc: When the party has 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types, Yelan's Max HP is increased by 6%/12%/18%/30%.

passive_talents.name: Adapt With Ease
passive_talents.desc: So long as an Exquisite Throw is in play, your own active character deals 1% more DMG. This increases by a further 3.5% DMG every second. The maximum increase to DMG dealt is 50%.

passive_talents.name: Necessary Calculation
passive_talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Taking All Comers
constellations.desc: When Exquisite Throw conducts a coordinated attack, it will fire an additional water arrow that will deal 14% of Yelan's Max HP as Hydro DMG.

constellations.name: Beware the Trickster's Dice
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Depth-Clarion Dice by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bait-and-Switch
constellations.desc: Increases all party members' Max HP by 10% for 25s for every opponent marked by Lifeline when the Lifeline explodes. A maximum increase of 40% Max HP can be achieved in this manner.

constellations.name: Dealer's Sleight
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Lingering Lifeline by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Winner Takes All
constellations.desc: After using Depth-Clarion Dice, Yelan will enter the Mastermind state. In this state, all of Yelan's Normal Attacks will be special Breakthrough Barbs. These Breakthrough Barbs will have similar abilities to normal ones and the DMG dealt will be considered Charged Attack DMG, dealing 156% of a normal Breakthrough Barb's DMG.
